name: Lights (eoss akira)
description:
Scared of the dark? Want to overcome your greatest fear... BY YOURSELF? LIGHTS might be the game for you. It’s not easy finding your way out of the maze, having only your flashlight as your only tool to help you see as you search for the exit while avoiding traps that may lead to your demise. The question is… will you be able to save yourself or will you be trapped forever in a maze in total darkness? And so... the search for an escape begins.

CONTROLS:

W - Move Forward

A - Strafe Left

D - Strafe Right

S - Move Backward

Mouse - Aim

P - Pause Game

-A Game by Team AbyssOrder-
